title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 347.4 - Cooperative agreements and purchase of service agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 347.4 - Cooperative agreements and purchase of service agreements

State Regulations
(a) Each local
social services district shall enter into written cooperation agreements with
county attorneys, corporation counsels and other law enforcement officials, as
required by sections
352
and
352-a
of
the Social Services Law. (b) Each
local social services district may enter into written purchase of service
agreements with other local agencies or private providers to assist the local
district with the child support functions for which it is responsible under
section
347.3
of this Part. Such
agreements shall provide for: (1)
adequate
supervision and monitoring by State and local social services officials; and
(2)
confidential treatment of
all information received pursuant to such agreements, as specified in section
347.19
of this Part. (c) All agreements shall be
submitted to the State Office of Child Support Enforcement for prior
approval. (d) Each local social
services district shall supply to the department such information as is
required to support claims for Federal and State reimbursement for services
performed under agreements entered in pursuant to subdivisions (a) and (b) of
this section, as well as services performed under agreements executed between
the State Department of Social Services and other agencies and
officials. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
347.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
